first.desc: Built the initial structure of the application: localization, routing, authorization, API requests
first.name: Vasily Gusev

second.name: Adilet Maksatuly
second.desc: Developed Board and EditProfile pages layout and logic. Implemented showing server errors as popups. Adaptive layout of whole app. Refactor King😎

third.name: Shahzod Kakhkhorov
third.desc: Developed Board and Main pages, Drag'n'Drop and communication with the server. Configured NgRx store of whole app

fourth.name: Dimitrii Shabanov
fourth.desc: Developed Not Found layout and logic

welcome.title: Manage projects easier with us
welcome.description: Teamwork - Free application to improve work efficiency and manage projects together with other team members!

course.title: Course
course.description: This project was developed as part of the free Angular course from Rolling Scopes School. In this course, you will learn how to develop web applications using Angular. The course lasts 8 weeks where you will get acquainted with the basic syntax of Angular as well as with NgRx. Click on the link to join the course
